experience.title: Charter Member
experience.description: The Indus Entrepreneurs (TiE) is a not-for-profit network of entrepreneurs fostering entrepreneurship, mentorship, and education.TiE was founded in 1992 in Silicon Valley by a group of successful entrepreneurs, corporate executives, and senior professionals with roots in the Indus region. The mission of TiE is to foster entrepreneurship through mentoring, networking, education, funding, and incubation.With a focus on giving back to the community, TiE's focus is on generating and nurturing the next generation of Entrepreneurs.TiE Charter Members are successful, high-profile entrepreneurs, corporate entrepreneurs, and thought leaders, who have reached a stage in their professional life when they are dedicated to the mission of TiE and have a strong desire to help other entrepreneurs in the community.To learn more, visit  chartermembers/TiE Bangalore:  TiE Dubai:  Global:

experience.title: Head of Growth & Strategy
experience.description: - Plan and implement digital marketing campaigns across various channels, such as social media, search engine marketing, email marketing, content marketing, and influencer partnerships. - Develop and implement strategies to acquire new users, including targeting specific audience segments, optimizing landing pages, and running performance-based advertising campaigns. - Identify opportunities to improve user conversion rates throughout the customer journey, from initial interest to trial or purchase.
experience.description_html: - Plan and implement digital marketing campaigns across various channels, such as social media, search engine marketing, email marketing, content marketing, and influencer partnerships. - Develop and implement strategies to acquire new users, including targeting specific audience segments, optimizing landing pages, and running performance-based advertising campaigns. - Identify opportunities to improve user conversion rates throughout the customer journey, from initial interest to trial or purchase.

experience.title: Growth & Strategy
experience.description: - Launched a new category B2B product by executing a strategic go-to-market motion and deploying effective demand generation initiatives; Added ARR 70000+ AED in 2 months.- Collaborated cross-functionally with product, design, sales, and customer success teams to ensure maximum efficiency of the content produced by getting clarity in goals, market research and historical insights.- Built a predictable, and scalable marketing & sales system that allowed my overseeing departments to grow from a team of 5 to 25 employees.- Created and deployed a Paid Social plan, messaging, and Email Marketing growth strategy.- Conducted market research and segmentation to develop a new market development plan to increase Clients' industry and geographical market share.- Executed complete rebranding; logo, website design, dashboard redesign, social pages, Paid Social andSetting up Email Marketing funnels
